name: Tap Fly Hero
description:
A crazy arcade platform challenge with ridiculously hard levels and funny ragdoll characters.

Tap Fly Hero presents you just an ordinary guy named Jim... OK, actually he's a superhero who can fly. He flies through this insanely difficult lava filled adventure with his crazy friends. Now it's your time to join in and help them beat the challenging tap-filled levels! Hover and fly your way through without bumping into lava!

Do you have it in you to become the greatest Tap Fly Hero?
